issue.title: System filter "organism" should only display organisms with data + ordering
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

System filter "organism" does not behave like in v2:
* it should only display organisms with data
* it should display organisms ordered by name


**Fixed versions :** 4.2.0
